Introduction

UEE is a South Korean singer, actress, and model under Lucky Company. She is best known as a former member of After School.

In 2007, UEE was a member of the short-lived group Five Girls formed by Good Entertainment. However, the group later disbanded due to the company's financial troubles. UEE later joined Pledis Entertainment and debuted as a member of AFTER SCHOOL in April 2009, with their single DIVA.

In July 2009, UEE debuted as an actress in MBC's historical drama Queen Seondok, and has appeared in various television dramas since—receiving numerous awards and consolidating her career. UEE debuted as a soloist on June 21, 2011 with the single "Sok Sok Sok."

On May 31, 2017, UEE graduated from AFTER SCHOOL after terminating her contract with Pledis Entertainment.
